title: CTO, CDO, IT product launch, IT startup
skills:
- Managing experience on both sides of the market: running in-house IT as CTO and selling at IT vendors being responsible for IT outsourcing and cloud business
- BD and evangelist of digitalization and innovations, run projects in a field of machine learning, BigData, IoT and etc.
- Solid knowledge and experience in core IT environment and delivery (infrastructure, DC, apps), DC/Sites building, massive core IT transformations and migrations PM experience
- Sales and structuring complex IT products and deals
- Startup experience: 100% standalone, zero-procedures, daily strategy changes, informality
- Product creation, adoption, bridge between customer and developers/delivery

primary.name: Baltic State Technical University, Saint-Petersurg, Russia

industries.name: Системная интеграция,  автоматизации технологических и бизнес-процессов предприятия, ИТ-консалтинг

experience.description:
Responsibilities: 
- business developer and evangelist for all aspects regarding innovations and digitalization, position SAP as innovative brand
- manage virtual team of multiple technical experts and presales
- sales and creation of SAP innovative products and projects, run as exec. PM
- creation and adoption new technologies/products for our customers and integrate it into business processes - grow SAP startups ecosystem trough accelerators, mentoring and SAP marketplace
- SAP CIS datacenters transformations and DC strategy leader

Examples of projects:
- created one of the largest permanent innovation exhibitions in SAP, main host and storyteller - doubled number of CIS startups at SAP marketplace
- signed first SAP marketplace deal in CIS
- blockchain (payments, trusted certificates exchange)
- chat bot (HR, food retail, IT support)
- Innovation Management process implementation
- face recognition+temperature detection
- shelf/SKU recognition in retail
- IoT (smart container, smart safety bracelet, air sensors and etc.) 
- ML (predictive analytics, digital twins, production optimizations)

industries.name: Системная интеграция,  автоматизации технологических и бизнес-процессов предприятия, ИТ-консалтинг

experience.position: Head of sales, Digital Core Cloud CIS
experience.description:
Responsibilities:
- Sales, product management, marketing and delivery of SAP cloud portfolio
- Products: ERP public cloud (SaaS, S/4HANA), ERP private cloud , HANA Enterprise Cloud (Database PaaS/IaaS)
- Managing delivery, cloud performance, SLA's
- All industries, all segments 

Main achievements:
- 2019 biggest cloud deal SAP CIS
- 2018 biggest cloud deal SAP CIS
- 2018 doubled number of existing cloud customers
- 2017 got award as HEC CIS market unit of the year in MEE
- 2017 got award for most innovative SAP deal
- 2017 Catalyst (e.g. top talent/HiPo)
- Created and implemented new sales plays which brought 40% of the additional bookings
- Signed first cloud deals in SAP with the TOP Oil&Gas customers
- HC optimization, reduced 20% HC keeping same targets and results
- Significantly imported delivery and quality of services

experience.position: Core team member, Business development director Russia & CIS
experience.description:
Green IT Globe (GIG) a startup company is about to radically change the IT world by building a decentralised and energy-efficient cloud all over the world. 

Responsibilities:
− Think out of the box, be a bit freaky, remain a child 
− To feel passion to the clouds, believe in a chance to change the world 
− Establish form scratch a profitable business in Russia, support WW deals

Main achievements:
− Signed about 6 Letters of Intent for $10+M deals to be signed 
− Created a funnel of potential customers for $30+M
− Established preliminary partners network and distribution
− Signed LOI for OEM partnership with one of the Russian HW manufacturer

industries.name: Бытовая техника, электроника, климатическое оборудование (продвижение, оптовая торговля)

experience.position: Head of Business Unit - IT outsourcing and cloud services (2013-2015), Sales executive (2011-2013)
experience.description:
Responsibilities:
− Accountable for overall IT outsourcing and cloud business and delivery in Russia
− Reporting to CEE. TCV, Revenue and OP responsibilities
− Developing and implementing long-term sales and product strategy for Russia

Main achievements:
− Developed and approved a full business plan for establishing local cloud business in Russia. Including full business forecast, technical solution design; sales, pre-sales and delivery team structure, 3rd party DC selection, marketing activities
− Revenue and OP quota achievement 
− Structured and adopted cloud services portfolio for Russian market
− Developed and approved sales strategy and investments for next 3 years (2014-2016)
− Signed contract for cloud services with one of the biggest Russian Oil&Gas company (~$8M TCV)
− Signed biggest on Russian market IT outsourcing deal with retail company (~$12.5M TCV)
− Initiated and build first in CEE SAP as a service, SAP HANA as a service deal
− Significantly increased level of satisfaction for the key customers

experience.company: «ROLF» group of companies (one of the top automontive retail companies in Russia,5500+ employees)

industries.name: Финансовые услуги (кэптивные банки и лизинговые компании)

experience.description:
Responsibilities:
- Managing IT infrastructure department (25+ subordinates, 20 sites, 400+ servers, 5500+ users)
- Strategic (up to 5 years) planning of IT infrastructure, implementing new services and technologies 
- Supporting core business development (new dealerships) and business application projects (ERP, CRM)
- Creating and managing portfolio of infrastructure projects (analyzing business needs, creating and defending business case, forming project teams, risk management)

Main achievements:
- Successfully initiated and accomplished first cloud project in Russia (2011-2012, GlobalCIO winner in 2013) - moved all core server infrastructure  (200+ servers and 50+ apps) to the German DC of external European service provider using IaaS, SaaS, PaaS, pay-per-use model. Created and defended in front of the board business case for 6 years. 
- Initiated and implemented a number of projects to reduce TCO of infrastructure during the financial crisis (2008-2010), achieved 25% saving of average annual budged with long term effect.
- Created service model of consumption and selling IT services to internal customers (service catalog, SLA, KPI, pricing model), implemented ITIL change and problem management
- Supported new business startups (new dealership centers Toyota, Lexus, Skoda, warehouse in Kazan, local call-centers)
- Realized strategic telecom project (implemented VOIP, MPLS network, telecom operators optimization (-20% cost saving + SLA), Wi-Max, Unified Communications
